Xigatse.title: Xigatse
Xigatse.byline: Xigatse (日喀则; Rìkāzé - Tibetan: གཞིས་ཀ་རྩ), also spelled Shigatse, is the second largest city in the Tibet Autonomous Region of China.

Xigatse (prefecture).title: Xigatse (prefecture)
Xigatse (prefecture).byline: Xigatse prefecture (日喀则地区; Rìkāzé Dìqū) is in Central Tibet.
